Functions
fza_fnc_targetingSetAcquisitionSource
Description

Sets the player's seat's aquisition source to the source specified - 0 is FCR / TADS (depending on if you have a radar) - 1 is HMD - 2 is AUTO - 3 is FXD

Parameters
_heli

The helicopter to act on

_acq

The acquisition source ID

Returns

Nothing

Examples
[_heli, 0] call fza_fnc_targetingSetAcquisitionSource
// The acquisition source is now 0 (FCR).
Author

mattysmith22
